output_data.clarification_question: What was the total face-to-face time dedicated to this established patient encounter (start time to end time)? Time is necessary to select the appropriate level for combined psychotherapy and E/M services (90833, 90836, or 90838).
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes (Typical duration for a high-level combined E/M and psychotherapy session, coded as 90838)?

primary_code.rationale: The session included both substantive psychotherapy (addressing passive ideation, guilt, and functional impairment) and medical decision-making (reviewing *Sertraline* efficacy and titrating the dosage from 50mg to 100mg). The final code will be 90838 (53+ min), 90836 (45 min), or 90833 (30 min), pending documentation of the total session duration.

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate* (F33.1), involving suicide risk assessment, medication titration, and behavioral intervention for persistent vegetative and cognitive symptoms.
